title: Dell D2020H 19.5-inch HD+ Monitor
cat_seo_title: Dell Monitor Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy latest Dell Monitor at best price in Bangladesh. Find your favorite Dell monitor model at lowest price. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Dell D2020H 19.5-inch HD+ Monitor

The Dell D2020H is a 19.5-inch HD+ monitor designed to enhance your daily workflow with its accessible size and impressive features. With an elegant design, this monitor seamlessly fits into any workspace, whether it's at home or in the office. The D2020H boasts a resolution of 1600 x 900 HD+, providing crisp and vibrant visuals that bring your content to life. The high-definition display ensures clear and detailed images, making it suitable for tasks like web browsing, document editing, and multimedia consumption. Equipped with a TN (Twisted Nematic) panel, the monitor offers decent color reproduction and wide viewing angles, ensuring that you can comfortably view the screen from different positions. The 60Hz refresh rate and 5ms response time contribute to smooth and fluid motion, minimizing blur and ghosting during fast-paced action scenes or while navigating through your applications. The D2020H offers both VGA and HDMI ports, allowing you to connect to a variety of devices, such as computers, laptops, gaming consoles, and media players. The VGA port provides compatibility with older devices, while the HDMI port enables high-quality digital connections. As an LED-backlit LCD monitor, the D2020H offers energy-efficient performance, consuming less power compared to traditional CCFL (cold cathode fluorescent lamp) monitors. This feature not only helps reduce electricity costs but also contributes to a more environmentally friendly setup. To enhance your user experience, Dell has included the Dell Display Manager with the D2020H. This software allows you to customize various display settings, such as brightness, contrast, and color calibration, according to your preferences. The Dell D2020H 19.5-inch HD+ Monitor provides a reliable and feature-rich solution for your everyday computing needs. With its sharp visuals, versatile connectivity options, and user-friendly design, it offers a comfortable viewing experience for both work and entertainment purposes.

The aspect ratio of Dell E2423H monitor is 16:9 and the contrast ratio is 3000:1 / 3000:1 (dynamic). Additionally, the horizontal and vertical viewing angle of this monitor is 178°. Comfortline, a software function that lowers harmful blue light emissions, makes the screen of this Dell E2423H monitor flicker-free. It is made to maximize eye comfort even when used for lengthy periods of time.

One is ports and slots where Security lock slot (based on Kensington Security Slot), Power connector, DP port, VGA ports are included. The another is cable connection where power cable, DP Cable, VGA cable (EMEA only) are included.

Adjust Your Monitor as Your Need

The Dell E2423H 23.8 inch has outstanding display position adjustment with the tilt angle -5°/+21°. This monitor is compatible with stands and mounts with its 100 x 100mm VESA pattern.

full_description:
Dell E2223HN 21.5" FHD Monitor

The Dell E2223HN 21.5" FHD Monitor is a high-performance display designed to boost productivity while also providing a visually engaging experience. Its vertically aligned (VA) screen, along with broad 178°/178° viewing angles, gives a sharp 1920 x 1080 Full HD quality at a smooth refresh rate of 60 Hz. The monitor has a 3000:1 contrast ratio, offers 16.7 million colors, and covers 83% of the CIE 1976 color gamut, making it ideal for professional work such as professional presentations. The Dell E2223HN Monitor has HDMI and VGA connectors for simple communication, and its adjustable stand allows for easy tilting for tailored viewing pleasure during lengthy use. In terms of productivity capabilities, the monitor stands out with Easy Arrange, a tool that allows you to organize numerous apps by using 38 pre-set window divisions and customization choices for up to five windows. The auto-restore function provides seamless transitions by remembering application positions even when the device is unplugged. Convenient shortcut keys allow easy adjustment of display management settings, saving important time and streamlining productivity. IT administrators benefit from effective asset management, the ability to capture and track monitor information, and the ability to configure numerous monitors at the same time using a single configuration. The Dell E2223HN 21.5" FHD Monitor ecologically sensitive design complies with the most recent regulatory and environmental requirements, including EnergyStar, EPEAT Gold, and TCO Certified. It is packaged in 100% recyclable cardboard, demonstrating a dedication to environmentally friendly packaging. Furthermore, energy conservation is a priority, as seen by the PowerNap function, which dims or puts the monitor to sleep when not in use, so adding to energy savings and confirming Dell's dedication to environmentally friendly methods.

full_description:
Dell P2223HC 21.5-inch FHD USB-C IPS Monitor

The Dell P2223HC Monitor featuring a 21.5" In-Plane Switching (IPS) panel with 16:9 aspect ratio, this monitor provides a 1920 x 1080 resolution for detailed views. Dock your laptop via USB Type-C input and get video, data, and up to 65W of power delivery using a single cable. The integrated USB hub features four 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports for connecting wired accessories. P2223HC monitor has an HDMI input along with DisplayPort input and output for daisy chaining monitors. Plus, multitask with ease thanks to window partition presets, auto restore functionality, and hassle-free configuration of display settings. Dell P2223HC 21.5-inch FHD Monitor designed with Low-blue-light screen technology that minimizes eye strain, while wide 178° horizontal and vertical viewing angles and a 250 nits brightness ensure viewing comfort. The monitor has 16.7 million colors and a 1000:1 static contrast ratio which can enable accurate and crisp colors. Overdrive the 14 ms response time to 5 ms for faster performance, and take advantage of smooth video playback due to a 60 Hz refresh rate of Dell P2223HC. Tilt, swivel, rotate, or adjust the height of the monitor to find your optimum angle. You can also use the integrated 100 x 100mm VESA mounting pattern to attach this monitor compatible third party mounts and stands, available separately.

Optimal Screen Space

The Dell P2223HC has a 21.5" In-Plane Switching (IPS) panel with a 1920 x 1080 FHD resolution and 16:9 aspect ratio ensures ample screen space. The large size monitor reduce your frequent scrolling problem.

Designed for Comfort and Efficiency

The Dell P2223HC 21.5-inch FHD Monitor integrated with ComfortView Plus, low-blue-light screen technology that is constantly on and eliminates potentially harmful blue light emissions without sacrificing color fidelity. To determine the ideal position for your setup, locate a comfortable position by tilting, swiveling, pivoting, and adjusting the monitor's height. Utilize the simple joystick control to navigate and modify the settings of your monitor screen.

Extensive Connectivity

The P2223HC FHD monitor comes with a wide range of connectivity interfaces, including DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI, and VGA ports where you can connect to many different devices easily. The four USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A connections on the integrated hub also let you attach wired accessories. The USB 3.2 Gen 1 standard, which is also known as USB 3.1 Gen 1 and USB 3.0, has a maximum throughput of 5 Gb/s. Reduce cable clutter with single USB-C connectivity that allows you to connect and power your laptops with up to 65W power delivery.

full_description:
Dell Ultrasharp U2422HE 24 inch FHD Type-C IPS Monitor

The Dell Ultrasharp  U2422HE monitor has a 1920 x 1080 resolution for detailed visuals. It has a 21.5" IPS panel with a 16:9 aspect ratio. With only one cable, you may dock your laptop for Type-C input and receive data, video, and up to 65W of power delivery. Four 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports on the integrated USB hub allow wired peripherals to be connected. In addition to DisplayPort input and output for daisy chaining monitors, the U2422HE monitor features an HDMI input. Moreover, window partition presets, auto restoration and hassle-free display setting configuration let you multitask with ease. The 21.5-inch Full HD Dell Ultrasharp U2422HE monitor has a brightness of 250 nits, a broad 178° horizontal and vertical viewing angle, and Low-blue-light screen technology to reduce eye strain. Accurate and crisp colors may be seen on the display thanks to its 1000:1 static contrast ratio and 16.7 million colors. Increase performance by overrating the 14 ms response time to 5 ms and benefit from the Dell Ultrasharp U2422HE has 60 Hz refresh rate for fluid video playback. To find your ideal angle, you can spin, tilt, swivel, or modify the monitor's height. Additionally, third-party mounts and stands that are compatible with this monitor and are sold separately can be attached using the included 100 x 100mm VESA mounting pattern.

Productive at Every Level

Easy Arrange of Dell Ultrasharp U2422HE Monitor enhances your multitasking skills by enabling you to quickly and effortlessly tile numerous apps across one or more screens with 38 pre-set window divisions and the customization of up to five windows.

Designed for multitasking

Attach the monitor to two PC sources. When a second PC is attached, our clever Auto KVM feature recognizes it and smoothly transfers control. One keyboard and mouse can be used to control two PCs by utilizing the KVM (keyboard, video, and mouse) feature.

Broad Connectivity

There are numerous interfaces for connecting to various devices on the U2422HE FHD monitor, such as DisplayPort, HDMI connectors. You can also connect wired peripherals to the integrated hub's four USB gen 2 Gen 1 Type-A connectors. Single USB-C connectivity helps you connect and power your computers with up to 65W of power output, so you can cut down on cable clutter.

full_description:
Dell S2722DGM 27 inch 165Hz QHD Curved Gaming Monitor

The Dell S2722DGM 27-inch QHD curved gaming monitor provides a high-performance and immersive gaming experience. This Dell S2722DGM monitor with a crystal-clear QHD resolution of 2560x1440 pixels delivers breathtaking graphics and crisp details, lifting gaming and entertainment content to a new level. The display employs VA technology which ensures brilliant colors and broad viewing angles, while the excellent 165Hz refresh rate ensures smooth and fluid animation during fast-paced gaming scenarios. The S2722DGM eliminates motion blur and ghosting, boosting the overall clarity of dynamic situations, with a snappy 6ms gray-to-gray quick response time (which can be further improved to 4ms, 2ms, or an astonishing 1ms with Motion Picture Response Time). There are several connectivity choices, including two HDMI connectors, one DisplayPort port, and a handy headphone out jack. The Dell S2722DGM is designed not just for gaming brilliance, but also for user comfort and eye care. This monitor, which includes features such as FreeSync technology for tear-free gaming, Flicker-Free technology to reduce eye strain, and a Low Blue Light mode to minimize potential blue light-induced discomfort during prolonged use, allows users to engage in extended gaming sessions without sacrificing visual quality or well-being. The Dell S2722DGM is essentially a flexible and powerful gaming monitor that blends cutting-edge display technology with intelligent features to fulfill the demands of even the most ardent gamers.

Speed into victory

A 165Hz refresh rate of Dell S2722DGM monitor gives for outstanding clarity in fast-moving pictures, allowing for quicker reaction times. With faster response speeds, you can remain ahead of the competition. Not only is your gameplay clearer, but with a 1ms MPRT/ 2ms gray to gray reaction time, the pixels themselves change color nearly instantly, removing motion blur. With AMD FreeSync Premium Technology, you can stay engaged in the heat of battle with fast, responsive, stutter-free gaming. This display has VRR functionality for gaming consoles.

Dive into the details

You won't believe how immersive a 27" curved QHD display will seem, with 77% more screen content than a Full HD monitor. The VA panel technology of Dell S2722DGM provides a high contrast ratio of 3000:1 for deeper blacks and brighter whites. Colors are incredibly bright over a broad viewing angle (178 degrees), thanks to sRGB 99% color coverage. A 1500R curved screen with a 3-sided thin border enhances your range of vision while decreasing distortion, glare, and reflection for a fully immersive gaming experience.

Designed for gaming

A new sleek, tapered stand with simple height and tilt adjustment allows you to game in comfort for extended periods of time. The angled base provides robust support while still having a smaller footprint, giving you more desktop room for extra gaming peripherals. Three user-defined profiles provide further customizing choices. The Timer, FPS Counter, and Dark Stabilizer allow you to regulate anything from frame rates to brightness and shadows. You may also use the new joystick and shortcut buttons on the back of the display to explore and adjust the OSD menus.

VESA DisplayHDR 600 gives the best colour accurace to the G3223Q gaming monitor. With the different viewing angle you can watch smoothly from different angle.

Amazing Color Accuracy

Dell G3223Q Monitor has VESA DisplayHDR 600 and DCI-P3 95% broad color coverage where gamers may enjoy incredibly brilliant and lifelike graphics. You get instantly correct colors as soon as you take the monitor out of the box because of factory pre-calibration with a Delta E less than 2 value. Without losing color accuracy or visual clarity, TUV Certified ComfortView Plus lowers risky blue light emissions.

4K resolution with HDMI 2.1

Dell G3223Q 32-inch UHD Gaming Monitor has most demanding visuals in PC gaming where HDMI 2.1 unlocks a native 4K resolution together with a smooth 144Hz refresh rate, and it supports 120Hz for consoles. A low latency HDR gaming experience without tearing or stuttering is provided by the Fast IPS panel's 1ms GTG reaction time, NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility, and AMD FreeSync Premium Pro.

Built for the Creative works

Dell G3223Q 32-inch UHD Gaming Monitor makes your arsenal of creative tools more benefitial. With this monitor changing the gamma settings, or fluidly switch between the native DCI-P3 color space and sRGB is possible. Also the uniformity compensation feature aids in dynamic screen balancing to provide uniform color and brightness so you can feel good about the standard of your work.

Playing game with Multitask

The Dell 32 4K UHD gaming monitor is built to handle simultaneous tasks with ease to help you play your way. Look up how to solve that tricky puzzle, keep up with your stream chat, or catch up on your favorite podcast is possible by G3223Q gaming monitor while you play games with the PIP and PBP modes.

IPS display technology ensures rich colors and wide viewing angles, making it excellent for professional jobs requiring color accuracy. With a refresh rate of 60Hz and a snappy gray-to-gray reaction time of 8ms (regular) and 5ms (fast), the P3223QE finds a balance between visual fidelity and speed, making it suited for a variety of professional applications. The connectivity possibilities are extensive, including two HDMI connectors and one DisplayPort. The Dell P3223QE is a performance and functionality powerhouse, appealing to professionals who need a high-quality display for jobs ranging from content production to data analysis.
